mapper.select: select * from users where uname = #{name, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and uspws = #{pass, jdbcType = DECIMAL}
mapper.sql: USERSID, EDUSERSID, CID, HID, CARDID, UNAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, SMALLDAI, "TYPE", "STATUS", USPWS, ZFPWS, PETNAME
mapper.select: select * from USERS where PETNAME=#{Uname} and USPWS=#{Upass}

select
distinct
from USERS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into USERS (USERSID, EDUSERSID, CID, HID, CARDID, UNAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, SMALLDAI, "TYPE", "STATUS", USPWS, ZFPWS, PETNAME ) values (#{usersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{edusersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cardid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smalldai,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uspws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zfpws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into USERS
USERSID,
EDUSERSID,
CID,
HID,
CARDID,
UNAME,
SEX,
BIRTHDAY,
PHONE,
SMALLDAI,
"TYPE",
"STATUS",
USPWS,
ZFPWS,
PETNAME,

mapper.update:
update USERS
USERSID = #{record.usersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EDUSERSID = #{record.edusersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CID = #{record.cid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HID = #{record.hid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARDID = #{record.cardid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNAME = #{record.uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMALLDAI = #{record.smalldai,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
"TYPE" = #{record.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
"STATUS" = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USPWS = #{record.uspws,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZFPWS = #{record.zfpws,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PETNAME = #{record.petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update USERS set USERSID = #{record.usersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EDUSERSID = #{record.edusersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CID = #{record.cid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HID = #{record.hid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARDID = #{record.cardid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNAME = #{record.uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMALLDAI = #{record.smalldai,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "TYPE" = #{record.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "STATUS" = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USPWS = #{record.uspws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZFPWS = #{record.zfpws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PETNAME = #{record.petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update USERS
EDUSERSID = #{edusersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CID = #{cid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HID = #{hid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARDID = #{cardid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ZFPWS = #{zfpws,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PETNAME = #{petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USERSID = #{usersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update USERS set EDUSERSID = #{edusersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CID = #{cid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HID = #{hid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARDID = #{cardid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMALLDAI = #{smalldai,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "TYPE" = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "STATUS" = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USPWS = #{uspws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZFPWS = #{zfpws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PETNAME = #{petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USERSID = #{usersid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.select:
select count(*) from USERS use
use.UNAME like '%'||#{search_name}||'%'
